thread.title: Trump Tops the Lineup for the First Republican Presidential Debate
thread.title_full: Trump Tops the Lineup for the First Republican Presidential Debate

title: Trump Tops the Lineup for the First Republican Presidential Debate
text:
Trump Tops the Lineup for the First Republican Presidential Debate Written by: Scott Gamm 08/06/15 - 6:27 PM EDT Tickers in this article: FOX 
NEW YORK (TheStreet) -- The 2016 election is still 15 months away and tonight is the first Republican presidential debate. 
The lineup of candidates is so large, 17 in total, that Fox News , owned by 21st Century Fox , is airing two debates. The first, which started at 5 p.m. ET, features seven candidates, who are arranged here in the order of their poll numbers from highest to lowest. Poll results come from Real Clear Politics, which averaged four recent polls from Fox News , Bloomberg , Monmouth University and CBS News The second debate, featuring Donald Trump , who continues to lead in the polls, is scheduled for 9 p.m. ET. Candidates, again are arranged in order of their poll numbers, from highest to lowest. More Headlines
